attributes.action: Stop HMRC taking PAYE national insurance for key workers during Coronavirus time
attributes.additional_details: It seems unfair these people are having to work and put their health and their families health at risk when others are staying home and being paid eighty percent of their wages.
attributes.background: Stop taking paye and National insurance contributions from key workers’ NHS, Doctor’s, nurses. Truck drivers, couriers, postmen, binned etc
